mobiles.name: guard lazy fat
mobiles.long_description: A fat lazy guard is standing here.
mobiles.description:
A fat balding man who is shabbily dressed, he is almost busting out of his 
uniform.
A few flies hang around his head.

mobiles.name: tiger bengal
mobiles.long_description: A bengal tiger leaps at you.
mobiles.description:
A very large muscular bengal tiger. It's fangs shine in the light and it's 
stripes clearly mark it. It roars as it approaches a new target.

mobiles.name: lion
mobiles.description:
A blood covered lion sits here looking back at you, i think it wants to add 
you to it's collection of bones.

mobiles.name: slave
mobiles.long_description: A scantily covered slave sits here.
mobiles.description: The slave screams in terror as your eye's fall upon him.

mobiles.name: slave
mobiles.description: A scantily clad slave who is ready for anyone to attack them.

mobiles.name: warrior wounded
mobiles.long_description: A wounded warrior stands here clutching his wounds.
mobiles.description: Blood gushes from many wounds covering his body.

mobiles.name: warrior
mobiles.description: The warrior gives you a stern look as he advances.

mobiles.name: amazon
mobiles.description:
She see's you looking at her and screams a battle cry that would chill the 
bones of any toughened man.

mobiles.name: amazon
mobiles.long_description: A badly wounded amazon is here.
mobiles.description: She clutches her side and grunts words you do not comprehend.

mobiles.name: balrog
mobiles.description:
Gouts of fire flare from it's nostrils as it's blackened hide shines in the 
light. Looking closer you see hard leathery wings mounted on it's back.

mobiles.name: master pit
mobiles.long_description: The pit master is here looking for his next victim.
mobiles.description: He stares back at you and into your soul

mobiles.name: lord ogre
mobiles.description: Standing more then eight feet in height the orge lord towers over you..

mobiles.name: ogre
mobiles.description: Standing about seven feet, he looks like a formidable opponent..

mobiles.name: axeman dwarf
mobiles.long_description: A squat dwarf is here swinging with fury.
mobiles.description: A small man with a beard is here frothing at the mouth.

mobiles.name: minotaur
mobiles.description: An angry looking minotaur snorts as it see's you.

mobiles.name: thief man
mobiles.long_description: A small man wanders around looting corpses.
mobiles.description: Looking at the thief you see him carrying many items.

mobiles.name: griffin
mobiles.description:
A large looking griffin struts before you, it's sharp talons glint in the 
light.

mobiles.name: slime acid
mobiles.long_description: Oozing slime covers the floor here.
mobiles.description: It's slime!

mobiles.name: warrior elven
mobiles.description: A tall lanky man, his eye's are slightly slanted and his ears come to points.

mobiles.name: barbarian
mobiles.description:
A strong muscular barbarian. A perfect specimen of his race, sweat pours 
from his skin as he wields his axe in a menacing fashion.

mobiles.name: kobold
mobiles.long_description: A small green kobold is here.
mobiles.description: It's ugly, it smells and it's running towards you!!.

mobiles.name: orc
mobiles.description:
Just like a kobold only bigger..and smellier!
Two large teeth pierce it's lower jaw..it lets out a scream that could only 
be compared with a banshee and runs into the fray.

mobiles.name: dog war
mobiles.description: A small but strongly built dog, it is covered in a leather breast protector.

mobiles.name: gladiator
mobiles.description: A heavily armored gladiator is here ready to impale you with his trident.

objects.name: plate breast iron
objects.description: A breastplate made of iron rests here.

objects.name: hide lion skin
objects.description: A hide of lion skin is here.

objects.name: helmet helm steel
objects.description: A sturdy steel helm rests here.

objects.name: bow elven
objects.description: A simple looking bow lies here.

objects.name: Lance fire balrog
objects.short_description: a fire lance of the balrog
objects.description: A large fire wrought lance burns on the ground here.

objects.name: skin balrog cloak
objects.description: A black sticky cloak lies here.

objects.name: cape tiger
objects.description: A tiger skin cape lies crumpled on the ground.

objects.name: spear
objects.description: A sharp wooden spear has been left here.

objects.name: net
objects.description: A gladiators net is on the ground.

objects.name: club spiked
objects.description: An orcs spiked club rests here.

objects.name: fountain
objects.description: A wrought iron fountain overflows with clear water.

rooms.name: The Main Gates
rooms.description:
You are standing at the main gates to the fighting pits of Tar Zaroth. Once 
built outside a great city it provided it's people many years of entertainment. 
Although the city is long gone and it's resources depleted, the fighting pits 
still remain and pull in crowds as far away as Midgaard and Solace.

To the north you can hear the clashing of weapons and the scream of the dying, 
Dare you enter.

extra_descr_data.description: A set of towering gates made of sturdy iron and set in solid stone.

rooms.name: Inside the Entrance
rooms.description:
To the left and right of you are the guard posts, two fat over weight guards 
can be seen resting at their posts. The floor here is soiled with the markings 
of many foot prints and to the north the shouting and cheers gets louder as 
you approach the arena.

extra_descr_data.description: A solid oak door reinforced with iron braceing.

rooms.name: A guard post
rooms.description:
A small alcove where a guard can watch the comings and goings of would be 
participants or spectators. The room is small, dark and relatively clean.

rooms.name: A guard post
rooms.description:
A small alcove where a guard can watch the comings and goings of would be 
participants or spectators. The room is small, dark and relatively clean.

rooms.name: Grand Gateway to the Arena
rooms.description:
This is the entrance way, looking out you see a huge sand covered arena with 
many a beast and man fighting to the death. Screams from the crowd is almost 
deafening to the ears as the blood splattered arena is currently in use for 
the annual kill or be killed tournament.

rooms.name: South wall of the Arena
rooms.description:
A sand and blood covered place of death and misery.
You see the grand gates of the arena behind you to the south.

rooms.name: South wall of the Arena
rooms.description:
A sand and blood covered place of death and misery. To the east of you lies 
the gates.

rooms.name: South wall of the Arena
rooms.description: A sand and blood covered place of death and misery.

rooms.name: South wall of the Arena
rooms.description:
A sand and blood covered place of death and misery. To the west of you lies 
the gates.

rooms.name: South wall of the Arena
rooms.description: A sand and blood covered place of death and misery.

rooms.name: East wall of the Arena
rooms.description: A sand and blood covered place of death and misery.

rooms.name: South-west corner
rooms.description:
A nice corner of the Arena to attack your opponents. the sand here is alot 
more free from the sign's of battle.

rooms.name: West wall of the Arena
rooms.description:
From here you can make out the faces of individual spectators, they manicly 
watch as the carnage unfolds.

rooms.name: West wall of the Arena
rooms.description:
From here you can make out the faces of individual spectators, they manicly 
watch as the carnage unfolds.

rooms.name: Inside the wall
rooms.description:
A panel slides shut behind you!!!

You stand inside a small hidden room inside the walls of the Arena, which 
must have been used many years ago by certain lucky contestants. Dust covers 
every part of this room and it is dark here.

You see a small inscription carved into the wall.

extra_descr_data.description:
Dear weary Arena contestant, if you have found this secret room, take some 
time to rest and refresh yourself. But remember the battle awaits you!.

Lord Necros
Ruler of the pits of despair

rooms.name: South-east corner
rooms.description:
A nice corner of the Arena to attack your opponents. the sand here is alot 
more free from the sign's of battle.

rooms.name: East wall of the Arena
rooms.description:
From here you can make out the faces of individual spectators, they manicly 
watch as the carnage unfolds.

rooms.name: East wall of the Arena
rooms.description:
From here you can make out the faces of individual spectators, they manicly 
watch as the carnage unfolds.

rooms.name: North-west corner of the Arena
rooms.description:
The sand here is alot more free from the sign's of battle. To the east of 
you is the entrance to a large cage mounted in the wall.

rooms.name: Infront of a cage
rooms.description:
In the north wall is a large cage door that is slightly ajar, it's old and 
rusted but moveable. Corpses lie littered around here mauled and the smell 
wafting from the mouth of the cage is almost unbearable.

extra_descr_data.description: An old rusty cage door which sits slightly open.
An old rusty cage door which sits slightly open.

rooms.name: The lions cage
rooms.description:
Inside you find that the smell is coming from an abundance of rotting flesh 
and bones, they sit knee high and it looks like it's owner wants to add you 
to it's collection.

extra_descr_data.description:
Looking closer you spot out atleast nine corpses in total, some chewed..some 
only half finished. The bugs and maggots seem to be finishing off the rest.

Looking closer you spot out atleast nine corpses in total, some chewed..some 
only half finished. The bugs and maggots seem to be finishing off the rest.

rooms.name: North wall of the Arena
rooms.description:
From here you can make out the faces of individual spectators, they manicly 
watch as the carnage unfolds.

To the east and west of here are entrances.

rooms.name: North wall of the Arena
rooms.description:
From here you can make out the faces of individual spectators, they manicly 
watch as the carnage unfolds.

To the north is what looks like a slave pen of sorts.

rooms.name: North wall of the Arena
rooms.description:
From here you can make out the faces of individual spectators, they manicly 
watch as the carnage unfolds.

rooms.name: North wall of the Arena
rooms.description:
From here you can make out the faces of individual spectators, they manicly 
watch as the carnage unfolds.

rooms.name: North-East corner of the Arena
rooms.description:
In the far north eastern corner of the arena, you can see the carnage unfold 
in all it's glory. The sand gives off an earie red glow as the sun passes 
over.

rooms.name: Slave pen
rooms.description:
A small dark unkept room used to house slaves. Beds of various sizes litter 
the room.

rooms.name: Pit trap
rooms.description:
You are in a square pit lined with spikes.

Bodies cover the floor of the pit.

extra_descr_data.description: Long sharp iron spikes covered in human and animal gore.

rooms.description:
You are in a square pit lined with spikes.

Bodies cover the floor of the pit.
